    May not Come To New Heading. May be led by a Chaos Lord having +1 leadership for +25 pts. May embark Chaos Space Marines for an additional +1 leadership (max. 10) for +35 pts. If Chaos Space Marines are taken, may embark Chosen Terminators for +10 pts (roll 2D6 and take highest when conducting a Hit and Run). May exchange weapon batteries for 45cm FP8 or 30cm FP10 at no cost. May exchange prow lance for S8 prow torpedoes for +10 pts. May exchange dorsal lance for 45cm S4 variant for +10 pts.
